text: Hi <@U06360JH6FP>, sorry we haven't really used this channel since running the collaborative campfires last year. These days it is probably best to start with the materials on <https://contributor.r-project.org> (I'll update the description here). Given your introduction, I think you might like to follow the full Contributing to R tutorial on <https://contributor.r-project.org/tutorials/> to get up to speed. Then I would recommend joining us at the next contributor office hour (I haven't sent out announcements yet, but the details are here: <https://www.meetup.com/r-contributors/events/296721315/>).
